pageContext.description: A large fragment missing from blade. No ornament.
pageContext.surface: Badly corroded and pitted. Well developed stop-ridge, low flanges.
pageContext.other: Width: edge 38mm; ridge 20mm; butt 16mm,Thickness: at ridge 20mm,Weight: 191.7 gms
